content:
Built around some experienced old dogs and a few passionate whippersnappers, Desk Dragons Interactive is an exciting, passionate Manchester-based studio. Utilising a wealth of knowledge within the team, our studio develops high-quality games for current and next-gen platforms.
The Dragon Way # Desk Dragons has a simple mission statement - Make the best games that the whole family can enjoy. We focus on making premium games with mass-market appeal and industry leading quality. We strive to be the “Pixar of Gaming”.
üïπÔ∏è Greatest GamesÔ∏è üöÄ Greatest Tech üßë‚Äçüíª Greatest Assets We know what makes not just a great game - but one you keep coming back to! We have previously worked on internationally renowned titles.
Deep within our Volcano Dragon Lair (actually a sunny office in Manchester, UK) we are getting our next great hit ready for you. We believe that we are on the cusp of a new technological wave - and gaming is at it’s heart!
Our studios harnesses the power of Unity Engine to deliver bleeding edge graphics, great sound and a world players loose themselves in! Desk Dragons side quest is to create amazing, world-class assets for the next-generation Unity developers.
summary: Built around some experienced old dogs and a few passionate whippersnappers, Desk Dragons Interactive is an exciting, passionate Manchester-based studio.
title: Desk Dragons Interactive
